mapper.select: -- 中板皮带 select devName as equipName , (case WHEN SC_PART='泵体' AND SC_CONTENT='是否漏浆' THEN '泵体无漏浆' WHEN SC_PART='泵体' AND SC_CONTENT='振动是否正常' THEN '泵体振动' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '上轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='温度' THEN '下轴承温度' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（上）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '上轴承润滑' WHEN SC_PART='轴承（下）' AND SC_CONTENT='润滑是否良好' THEN '下轴承润滑' ELSE SC_PART END )as part ,RESULT as result ,ALTPID as altpid from dxj_spot_result WHERE DEPT_NAME='磨浮设备' AND (ZONE_NAME='5#皮带' OR ZONE_NAME='中重型板式给料机' OR ZONE_NAME='石灰泵房') AND TASKSTART_TM="${time}" GROUP BY equipName,part ORDER BY FIELD(equipName,'5#皮带运输机','1#中重型板式给矿机','2#中重型板式给矿机','1#石灰泵','2#石灰泵','石灰搅拌桶'),part
